Text:
Hi sidehacker/TLC,

Many thanks for the fine films you're putting up, I've downloaded a few. Akerman, Sokurov, now v slowly La Piscine. I'm uploading the rare ones I have, best wishes,

Nax610

Dear Sidehacker,

I recently downloaded La Piscine, the picture was great, but it had no sound. Any tips how to solve this? It is only with this particular film that I have a problem, and I  can't wait to see it properly - it is one of favorite films ever and you can't buy it anywhere. Thanks,  Roussanka

'TLC promotes world cinema in the face of Hollywood trash.'

I can only second that. Thanks, sidehacker.
Merci beaucoup, Monsieur Sidehacker. Romy Schneider what a gorgeous lady...Thanks again and keep up the great work, sidehacker!
